title: Poove Poove Penpoove Song Lyrics Once More
stanzas: <div>Poove Poove Penpoove Song Lyrics Once More

Poove poove pen poove
en poojaiku vara vendum(2)

nam kadhal vazha vendum
nammai kaatrum vazhtha vendum
nee vidum moochile
naan konjam vazhgiren

Poove poove pen poove
un poojaiku vara vendum

nam kadhal vazha vendum
nammai kaatrum vazhtha vendum
nee vidum moochile
naan konjam vazhgiren

Kadhalin vayadhu
adi eththanai kodi
aththanai varusham
naam vazhanum vaadi

boomiyai thaluvum
vergalai pole
unnidam thaluvi
naan vazhndhida vanthen

aandu nooru neeyum naanum
serndhu vazha vendum
maandu pona
kavigal nammai
meendum paada vendum

Poove poove pen poove
en poojaiku vara vendum

nam kadhal vazha vendum
nammai kaatrum vazhtha vendum
nee vidum moochile
naan konjam vazhgiren
